name: Rhino Hero
description:
It's a bird! It's a plane! It's Rhino Hero! No building too high, no street too dangerous for this caped crusader, as he scales buildings and patrols the city protecting the citizens. On his quest for safety, he must use caution as even the most solid buildings may start to sway and wobble.
Can you help Rhino Hero accomplish the challenge to build a skyscraper as tall and solid as can be?

In the physics based game kids will be able to control a crane to build the highest skyscraper possible. Evil-doers of all kind try to get the construction site to collapse. But the kids are not alone: Rhino Hero will help them and protect the skyscraper against the nefarious villains and their diligent minions.

Highlights:
1. Original and fun physics based game for kids 4-10
2. Control a crane and move it with simple gestures from left to right to build the highest skyscraper!
3. Various shapes and colors of blocks with imaginative animations inside!
4. Special blocks, like ice-block and glue-block, that influence the construction in a good, but also in a bad way - be careful!
5. Evil-doers trying to get the construction to collapse. Super Rhino will do his best to protect the building project!
